summary: This document is an email chain from July 3, 2020, within the FBI New York Field Office. It forwards a communication from a woman (Althea) who contacted the FBI via LinkedIn, claiming to have information potentially relevant to the Epstein investigation due to a rape she experienced 20 years prior. The FBI coordinates to have the Epstein Task Force follow up with her.

persons.name: Althea
persons.context: A woman who contacted the FBI via LinkedIn, stating she has information that may be helpful to the Epstein investigation due to a rape she experienced 20 years ago. She requests a Zoom interview.

persons.name: Assistant Director in Charge
persons.role: FBI Assistant Director in Charge, New York Field Office
persons.context: The FBI official who initially received Althea's LinkedIn message and forwarded her contact information to the Epstein investigation team.

connections.description: Althea reached out to the Assistant Director in Charge via LinkedIn, initiating contact to provide information to the FBI's Epstein investigation.

events.title: Informant Contact to FBI
events.description: A woman named Althea contacts the FBI New York Field Office via LinkedIn, offering information potentially relevant to the Epstein investigation related to a past rape.

events.title: Alleged Rape of Informant
events.description: Althea references being raped 20 years prior to 2020, which she believes may connect to the Epstein case. She mentions previously trying to get justice.

keyFacts: A potential witness named Althea contacted the FBI in July 2020, claiming to have information linking a rape she experienced 20 years earlier to the Epstein investigation.
The communication shows the FBI's Epstein Task Force was actively following up on leads from the public in 2020.
The informant expressed a preference for a Zoom interview over a phone call for security reasons, citing past bad experiences and living under online threats.
The informant mentioned waiting for notes from Scotland Yard regarding the incident from over 20 years ago.
